22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include <catch.hpp>
24 #include <Eigen/Dense>
25 
26 using namespace Mutation;
27 using namespace Mutation::Thermodynamics;
28 using namespace Mutation::Transport;
29 using namespace Mutation::Utilities;
30 using namespace Mutation::Utilities::IO;
31 using namespace Catch;
32 using namespace Eigen;
33 
39 void checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(
40  CollisionPair& pair, const VectorXd& T, const MatrixXd& ref)
41 {
42  REQUIRE(T.size() == ref.rows());
43 
44  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Q11 = pair.get("Q11"); REQUIRE(Q11->loaded());
45  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Q12 = pair.get("Q12"); REQUIRE(Q12->loaded());
46  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Q13 = pair.get("Q13"); REQUIRE(Q13->loaded());
47  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Q22 = pair.get("Q22"); REQUIRE(Q22->loaded());
48 
49  for (int i = 0; i < T.size(); ++i) {
50  CHECK(Q11->compute(T(i))*1.0e20 == Approx(ref(i,0)));
51  CHECK(Q12->compute(T(i))*1.0e20 == Approx(ref(i,1)));
52  CHECK(Q13->compute(T(i))*1.0e20 == Approx(ref(i,2)));
53  CHECK(Q22->compute(T(i))*1.0e20 == Approx(ref(i,3)));
54  }
55 }
56 
60 TEST_CASE("Test constant collision integrals", "[transport]")
61 {
62  // Generate a fake collision integral database
63  TemporaryFile file;
64  file << "<collisions>"
65  << " <pair s1=\"N2\" s2=\"N2\">"
66  << " <Q11 type=\"constant\" value=\"10\" />"
67  << " </pair>"
68  << "</collisions>";
69  file.close();
70 
71  // Load the temporary collision database
72  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
73 
74  // Create necessary species to define the pairs
75  Species N2("N2");
76 
77  // Create the collision pair
78  CollisionPair pair(N2, N2, &(doc.root()));
79 
80  // Make sure that the warning would be displayed
81  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Q11 = pair.get("Q11");
82  REQUIRE(Q11->loaded());
83 
84  // Check that indeed the value is given
85  CHECK(Q11->compute(1000.0) == 10.0);
86  CHECK(Q11->compute(2000.0) == 10.0);
87 }
88 
92 TEST_CASE("Test exp-poly collision integrals", "[transport]")
93 {
94  // Generate a fake collision integral database (all the same)
95  TemporaryFile file;
96  file << "<collisions>"
97  << " <pair s1=\"N2\" s2=\"N2\">"
98  << " <Q11 type=\"exp-poly\" units=\"K,Å-Å\">"
99  << " -5.0e-3 1.0e-1 -9.8e-1 6.45e+0 </Q11>"
100  << " <Q12 type=\"exp-poly\" units=\"K,Å-Å\">"
101  << " -5.0e-3 1.0e-1 -9.8e-1 6.45e+0 </Q12>"
102  << " <Q13 type=\"exp-poly\" units=\"K,Å-Å\">"
103  << " -5.0e-3 1.0e-1 -9.8e-1 6.45e+0 </Q13>"
104  << " <Q22 type=\"exp-poly\" units=\"K,Å-Å\">"
105  << " -5.0e-3 1.0e-1 -9.8e-1 6.45e+0 </Q22>"
106  << " </pair>"
107  << "</collisions>";
108  file.close();
109 
110  // Load the temporary collision database
111  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
112 
113  // Create necessary species to define the pairs
114  Species N2("N2");
115 
116  // Create the collision pair
117  CollisionPair pair(N2, N2, &(doc.root()));
118 
119  // Temperatures used for reference values
120  VectorXd T(5); T << 300.0, 500.0, 1000.0, 2000.0, 5000.0;
121 
122  // Reference data
123  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2), Rows (300, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000 K)
124  MatrixXd ref(5,4); ref <<
125  24.1865, 24.1865, 24.1865, 24.1865,
126  20.527, 20.527, 20.527, 20.527,
127  16.511, 16.511, 16.511, 16.511,
128  13.2345, 13.2345, 13.2345, 13.2345,
129  9.6612, 9.6612, 9.6612, 9.6612;
130 
131  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
132 }
133 
137 TEST_CASE("Test from A*, B*, C* collision integrals", "[transport]")
138 {
139  // Generate a fake collision integral database (all the same)
140  TemporaryFile file;
141  file << "<collisions>"
142  << " <pair s1=\"N2\" s2=\"N2\">"
143  << " <Q11 type=\"constant\" value=\"1e-20\" />"
144  << " <Q12 type=\"from C*\" />"
145  << " <Q13 type=\"from B*\" />"
146  << " <Q22 type=\"from A*\" />"
147  << " <Ast type=\"table\" units=\"m-m\" >"
148  << " 500 5000, 1.0 20.0 </Ast>"
149  << " <Bst type=\"table\" units=\"m-m\" >"
150  << " 500 5000, 5.0 15.0 </Bst>"
151  << " <Cst type=\"table\" units=\"m-m\" >"
152  << " 500 5000, 3.0 22.0 </Cst>"
153  << " </pair>"
154  << "</collisions>";
155  file.close();
156 
157  // Load the temporary collision database
158  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
159 
160  // Create necessary species to define the pairs
161  Species N2("N2");
162 
163  // Create the collision pair
164  CollisionPair pair(N2, N2, &(doc.root()));
165  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Ast = pair.get("Ast");
166  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Bst = pair.get("Bst");
167  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Cst = pair.get("Cst");
168 
169  // Temperatures used for reference values
170  VectorXd T(5); T << 500.0, 1000.0, 2000.0, 3000.0, 5000.0;
171 
172  // Reference data
173  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2)
174  MatrixXd ref(5,4);
175  for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {
176  ref(i,0) = 1.0;
177  ref(i,1) = Cst->compute(T(i));
178  ref(i,2) = 1.25*Cst->compute(T(i)) - 0.25*Bst->compute(T(i));
179  ref(i,3) = Ast->compute(T(i));
180  }
181 
182  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
183 }
184 
188 TEST_CASE("Test ratio collision integrals", "[transport]")
189 {
190  // Generate a fake collision integral database (all the same)
191  TemporaryFile file;
192  file << "<collisions>"
193  << " <pair s1=\"N2\" s2=\"N2\">"
194  << " <Q11 type=\"table\" units=\"K,Å-Å\">"
195  << " 500 5000, 1.0 20.0 </Q11>"
196  << " <Q12 type=\"ratio\" ratio=\"1.0\" integral=\"Q11\" />"
197  << " <Q13 type=\"ratio\" ratio=\"2.0\" integral=\"Q11\" />"
198  << " <Q22 type=\"ratio\" ratio=\"3.0\" integral=\"Q11\" />"
199  << " </pair>"
200  << "</collisions>";
201  file.close();
202 
203  // Load the temporary collision database
204  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
205 
206  // Create necessary species to define the pairs
207  Species N2("N2");
208 
209  // Create the collision pair
210  CollisionPair pair(N2, N2, &(doc.root()));
211 
212  // Temperatures used for reference values
213  VectorXd T(5); T << 500.0, 1000.0, 2000.0, 3000.0, 5000.0;
214 
215  // Reference data
216  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2), Rows (500, 1000, 2000, 3000, 5000 K)
217  MatrixXd ref(5,4); ref <<
218  1.00000, 1.00000, 2.00000, 3.00000,
219  3.11111, 3.11111, 6.22222, 9.33333,
220  7.33333, 7.33333, 14.6667, 22.0000,
221  11.5556, 11.5556, 23.1111, 34.6667,
222  20.0000, 20.0000, 40.0000, 60.0000;
223 
224  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
225 }
226 
230 TEST_CASE("Test Murphy collision integrals", "[transport]")
231 {
232  // Generate a fake collision integral database (all the same)
233  TemporaryFile file;
234  file << "<collisions>"
235  << " <pair s1=\"N2\" s2=\"N2\">"
236  << " <Q11 type=\"table\" units=\"K,Å-Å\">"
237  << " 500 5000, 1.0 20.0 </Q11>"
238  << " <Q12 type=\"table\" units=\"K,Å-Å\">"
239  << " 500 5000, 2.0 15.0 </Q12>"
240  << " <Q13 type=\"Murphy\">"
241  << " <Q1 type=\"ratio\" ratio=\"1\" integral=\"Q11\" />"
242  << " <Q2 type=\"ratio\" ratio=\"1\" integral=\"Q11\" /> </Q13>"
243  << " <Q22 type=\"Murphy\">"
244  << " <Q1 type=\"ratio\" ratio=\"1\" integral=\"Q11\" />"
245  << " <Q2 type=\"ratio\" ratio=\"1\" integral=\"Q12\" /> </Q22>"
246  << " </pair>"
247  << "</collisions>";
248  file.close();
249 
250  // Load the temporary collision database
251  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
252 
253  // Create necessary species to define the pairs
254  Species N2("N2");
255 
256  // Create the collision pair
257  CollisionPair pair(N2, N2, &(doc.root()));
258  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Q11 = pair.get("Q11");
259  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Q12 = pair.get("Q12");
260 
261  // Temperatures used for reference values
262  VectorXd T(5); T << 500.0, 1000.0, 2000.0, 3000.0, 5000.0;
263 
264  // Reference data
265  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2), Rows (500, 1000, 2000, 3000, 5000 K)
266  MatrixXd ref(5,4);
267  for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i) {
268  ref(i,0) = Q11->compute(T(i));
269  ref(i,1) = Q12->compute(T(i));
270  ref(i,2) = std::sqrt(2.0) * Q11->compute(T(i)); // sqrt(Q11^2 + Q11^2)
271  ref(i,3) = std::sqrt(ref(i,0)*ref(i,0) + ref(i,1)*ref(i,1));
272  }
273  ref *= 1e20;
274 
275  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
276 }
277 
281 TEST_CASE("Test Pirani potential collision integrals", "[transport]")
282 {
283  // Generate a fake collision integral database
284  // From Laricchiuta2007
285  // O2-N2: beta = 8.1055, eps0 = 11.66, re = 3.805
286  // O2-O2: beta = 8.1375, eps0 = 11.97, re = 3.78
287  // N2-N2+: beta = 8.0746, eps0 = 96.57, re = 3.454
288  // O2-N2+: beta = 8.1055, eps0 = 90.61, re = 3.434
289  TemporaryFile file;
290  file << "<collisions>"
291  << " <dipole-polarizabilities units=\"Å-Å-Å\">"
292  << " <species name=\"N2\" value=\"1.74\" />"
293  << " <species name=\"N2+\" value=\"1.75\" />"
294  << " <species name=\"O2\" value=\"1.60\" />"
295  << " </dipole-polarizabilities>"
296  << " <effective-electrons>"
297  << " <species name=\"N2\" value=\"7.6\" />"
298  << " <species name=\"O2\" value=\"9.3333333333\" />"
299  << " </effective-electrons>"
300  << " <pair s1=\"O2\" s2=\"O2\">"
301  << " <Pirani-Data beta=\"8.1375\" re=\"3.78\" phi0=\"11.97\"/>"
302  << " <Q11 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
303  << " <Q12 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
304  << " <Q13 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
305  << " <Q22 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
306  << " </pair>"
307  << " <pair s1=\"N2\" s2=\"O2\">"
308  << " <Q11 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
309  << " <Q12 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
310  << " <Q13 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
311  << " <Q22 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
312  << " </pair>"
313  << " <pair s1=\"O2\" s2=\"N2+\">"
314  << " <Pirani-Data beta=\"8.1055\" re=\"3.434\" phi0=\"90.61\"/>"
315  << " <Q11 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
316  << " <Q12 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
317  << " <Q13 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
318  << " <Q22 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
319  << " </pair>"
320  << " <pair s1=\"N2+\" s2=\"N2\">"
321  << " <Q11 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
322  << " <Q12 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
323  << " <Q13 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
324  << " <Q22 type=\"Pirani\"/>"
325  << " </pair>"
326  << "</collisions>";
327  file.close();
328 
329  // Load the temporary collision database
330  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
331 
332  // Create necessary species to define the pairs
333  Species N2("N2"), O2("O2"), N2p("N2+");
334 
335  // Temperatures used for reference values
336  VectorXd T(5); T << 300.0, 500.0, 1000.0, 2000.0, 5000.0;
337 
338  SECTION("Neutral-Neutral, explicit data") {
339  // O2-O2 is defined with explicit beta, re, and phi0 values
340  CollisionPair pair(O2, O2, &(doc.root()));
341 
342  // Reference data
343  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2), Rows (300, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000 K)
344  MatrixXd ref(5,4); ref <<
345  36.33002, 31.38263, 28.98695, 40.62648,
346  30.66071, 27.80487, 26.38351, 33.99039,
347  26.43153, 24.85450, 23.79778, 29.47545,
348  23.60094, 22.24057, 21.22414, 26.79771,
349  19.93869, 18.62013, 17.68011, 23.08201;
350 
351  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
352  }
353 
354  SECTION("Neutral-Neutral, implicit data") {
355  // N2-O2 is defined with implicit data using the species polarizability
356  // and effective electrons
357  CollisionPair pair(N2, O2, &(doc.root()));
358 
359  // Reference data
360  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2), Rows (300, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000 K)
361  MatrixXd ref(5,4); ref <<
362  36.37455, 31.49629, 29.14517, 40.66233,
363  30.78823, 27.98169, 26.57213, 34.13051,
364  26.60832, 25.03100, 23.96368, 29.69713,
365  23.75599, 22.37806, 21.34904, 26.99934,
366  20.03925, 18.70630, 17.75762, 23.21459;
367 
368  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
369  }
370 
371  SECTION("Ion-Neutral, explicit data") {
372  // N2+-O2 is defined with explicit beta, re, and phi0 values
373  CollisionPair pair(N2p, O2, &(doc.root()));
374 
375  // Reference data
376  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2), Rows (300, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000 K)
377  MatrixXd ref(5,4); ref <<
378  93.35611, 75.03173, 63.39025, 97.95099,
379  68.32777, 53.92690, 45.14383, 74.18166,
380  44.29329, 34.74493, 29.69348, 49.79153,
381  30.08704, 24.88870, 22.57074, 33.77278,
382  21.61377, 19.76986, 18.79716, 23.96274;
383 
384  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
385  }
386 
387  SECTION("Ion-Neutral, implicit data") {
388  // N2+-N2 is defined with implicit data using the species polarizability
389  // and effective electrons
390  CollisionPair pair(N2p, N2, &(doc.root()));
391 
392  // Reference data
393  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2), Rows (300, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000 K)
394  MatrixXd ref(5,4); ref <<
395  97.82063, 78.77619, 66.65381, 102.23491,
396  71.71063, 56.70362, 47.48123, 77.55206,
397  46.45066, 36.37620, 30.96292, 52.13261,
398  31.30984, 25.71801, 23.19851, 35.20541,
399  22.16644, 20.17746, 19.16061, 24.56247;
400 
401  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
402  }
403 }

408 TEST_CASE("Test table collision integrals", "[transport]")
409 {
410  // Generate a fake collision integral database which tests clipping and
411  // interpolation
412  TemporaryFile file;
413  file << "<collisions>"
414  << " <pair s1=\"N2\" s2=\"N2\">"
415  << " <Q11 type=\"table\" units=\"K,Å-Å\">" // defaults to linear
416  << " 1000 2000 4000 5000 6000,"
417  << " 0.12 0.19 0.43 0.55 0.66 </Q11>"
418  << " <Q12 type=\"table\" units=\"K,Å-Å\" interpolator=\"MonotoneCubic\">"
419  << " 1000 2000 4000 5000 6000,"
420  << " 1.12 1.19 1.43 1.55 1.66 </Q12>"
421  << " <Q13 type=\"table\" units=\"K,Å-Å\" interpolator=\"Chebyshev\">"
422  << " 1000 2000 4000 5000 6000,"
423  << " 2.12 2.19 2.43 2.55 2.66 </Q13>"
424  << " <Q22 type=\"table\" units=\"K,Å-Å\" clip=\"no\">"
425  << " 1000 2000 4000 5000 6000,"
426  << " 3.12 3.19 3.43 3.55 3.66 </Q22>"
427  << " </pair>"
428  << "</collisions>";
429  file.close();
430 
431  // Load the temporary collision database
432  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
433 
434  // Create necessary species to define the pairs
435  Species N2("N2");
436 
437  // Create the collision pair
438  CollisionPair pair(N2, N2, &(doc.root()));
439 
440  // Temperatures used for reference values
441  VectorXd T(4); T << 500.0, 1000.0, 3000.0, 5000.0;
442 
443  // Reference data
444  // Columns (Q11, Q12, Q13, Q22 A^2), Rows (500, 1000, 3000, 5000 K)
445  MatrixXd ref(4,4); ref <<
446  0.12, 1.12, 2.12, 3.085,
447  0.12, 1.12, 2.12, 3.12,
448  0.31, 1.3015, 2.3053, 3.31,
449  0.55, 1.55, 2.5485, 3.55;
450 
451  checkHeavyCollisionIntegrals(pair, T, ref);
452 }

457 TEST_CASE("Test warning collision integrals", "[transport]")
458 {
459  // Generate a fake collision integral database
460  TemporaryFile file;
461  file << "<collisions>"
462  << " <pair s1=\"N2\" s2=\"N2\">"
463  << " <Q11 type=\"warning\" value=\"10\" />"
464  << " </pair>"
465  << "</collisions>";
466  file.close();
467 
468  // Load the temporary collision database
469  XmlDocument doc(file.filename());
470 
471  // Create necessary species to define the pairs
472  Species N2("N2");
473 
474  // Create the collision pair
475  CollisionPair pair(N2, N2, &(doc.root()));
476 
477  // Capture the standard output
478  std::ostringstream oss;
479  std::streambuf* cout_streambuf = std::cout.rdbuf();
480  std::cout.rdbuf(oss.rdbuf());
481 
482  // Make sure that the warning would be displayed
483  SharedPtr<CollisionIntegral> Q11 = pair.get("Q11");
484  REQUIRE(Q11->loaded());
485 
486  // Restore standard output
487  std::cout.rdbuf(cout_streambuf);
488 
489  // Check what was written
490  CHECK(oss.str() ==
491  "Warning: missing collision integral Q11_(N2,N2). "
492  "Using a constant value of 10.\n");
493 
494  // Check that indeed the value is given
495  CHECK(Q11->compute(1000.0) == 10.0);
496 }
